## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (e790577c4ab38bd32630e01306a0868728080c43b16003fd81dc5d6d2d6bd4ed)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'blacky-sheppoing' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
